attributes.action: Make it compulsary for vehicles to have third party insurance displayed on thier number plates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, like thousands of other motorists, get fed up with drivers going uninsured/untaxed/unlicensed.  If we had a system that showed on our number plates that we had minimum third party insurance/tax it would make it very easy for the police/traffic wardens and public to know the vehicle was unlawful.
